title: Client Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Clearwater, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Screened over the phone by a representative from the Human Resources department. A separate interview was scheduled with multiple employees, about four all together. There was a member of the Human Resource department and three members of the department you are interviewing for. It was a panel style interview.

title: Outpatient Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: Overall - Chaotic. They ran over 1 hour late to start interview. I sat in lobby with patient. The PhD psychologist was not professional. But I needed the job. Big mistake to ignore red flags.
Interview Questions: They asked about my licensure status.

title: Children's Outpatient Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was fine. Normal questions asked and said they would contact after finishing all interviews. Environment was decent as well. They seem under staffed and needing help soon.
Interview Questions: What do you think is your strong skill?

title: Grant Writer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: First they do a phone screening, then you meet with your manager then upper level staff. They did say that they had Competitive benefits and salary. Salary was comparable to others in the area.
Interview Questions: What is your grant writing experience

title: Child Safety Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the job online. I was called in for an interview with about 7 other applicants. We were all asked a list of questions and asked the questions on the list. Each application was given time to answer the question.

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Clearwater, FL) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: I got called in for and interview. Basic interview questions after a detailed description of the position. They called a couple days later to ask a couple follow up questions and then offered me the postion
Interview Questions: In your last job what did you enjoy the most and what did you  dislike the most?

title: Child Safety Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: Completed application online and within a week got a call for an interview. Hired on the spot. Very easy just be yourself.  HR was very personable and made the interview seem as though it was casual conversation.
Interview Questions: What is a situation that I've been in to make a customer happy?

title: Child Safety Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Clearwater, FL)
Interview Descriptions: I saw an advertisement for a job fair at their Clearwater location, hiring for multiple positions. They had about 6 tables, one for each department. I told her about myself and she proceeded to tell me about the open positions they had. I previously applied online and let her know that. She told me they’d be contacting me to begin the hiring process. I was in and out within 15min.

title: Behavioral Health Service Assessor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: facetoface - questioning, how you handle situations pertaining to job etc. want to see if you are big on rapport building and what is important to have in a supervisor
Interview Questions: Relaxed, comfortable - scenario questions, deescalation skills, have you worked a mendicak record, ethical delenma

title: Customer Support Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Directions for Living
Interview Descriptions: The women who conducted the interview were fairly easy to talk to. I did not like how they had two people interview at a time. It makes it more uncomfortable doing it this way. They asked a question about where you see yourself in the organization later on. For someone who isn't interested in working in social services long-term, this would be difficult to answer. It would have been better if that question was not asked. They seem to be looking for someone who can handle more than one task at a time. For instance, the Customer Service Representative would need to be able to help the client at the desk as well as handle an incoming phone call. Unfortunately, the pay doesn't seem to match the amount of responsibility and potential stress a worker would be under.

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Clearwater, FL) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: Basic interview questions related to the position and experience. The panel was very pleasant and made you feel relaxed. They have questions written out to ask and then they will be taking notes.
Interview Questions: What makes you unique for the position?

title: Child Safety Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Clearwater, FL)
Interview Descriptions:
3 person interview
Lasted about an hour or a little more
Easy going, felt very comfortable, everyone was very nice
Asked a lot of questions on how to handle certain situations 
Asked if I had ever had to handle situations similar to the situations I would encounter there
Interview Questions:
Why are you the best candidate
What would previous employers say about you
What would you do in situations

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Directions for Living (Largo, FL) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: it was casual.  they asked questions about interventions and trauma informed care. it was awhile ago so I don't remember everything they asked. it depends on what supervisor is doing the interview. sometimes it's one or it may be 2.  there is only one candidate in the room.

title: Child Safety Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Directions for Living in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Was called for an interview the same day I applied. Interview was scheduled for a few days later. Difficult to find the exact location SO GIVE YOURSELF EXTRA TIME.
Interview Questions:
What is your style?.....theoretical Orientation for therapy
What have I overcome?
What do I know about the company?
Tell us about your experience?
Advice- come knowledgeable. This is a good position for licensed professional
